name: Glorious City
description:
Welcome to Glorious City

This is a turn-based strategy game where the player has to build up a City State and rule over it for five epochs, from antiquity to modern age. At the beginning as a small City State that's not even worth to be called a village, it's on you to develop a stable and prospering economy, infrastructure and political system.

Build your city

Construct buildings to enlarge your city as well as your power.

Protect your City

Some NPC's will try to attack and destroy you - destroy them first and protect your city!

Manage Politics and Trade

Deal with NPC's to enlarge your influence outside of your City State and boost it through smart trading.

Manage your Population

 Satisfy your population to keep it in-line and avoid rebellions.

Use Items

Gain Items to boost your population and your buildings.

Glorious City is still a work in progress. Planned features contain:

  • Quests: NPC's give you quests where you can gain goods, money, population or items.
  • New Special Units: Special units with unique abilities.
  • Climate: Take care of your environment - you never know where the next catastrophe will occur.
  • Vestiges: Discover vestiges and secure their bonusses for you.

2021: 3rd place at crossmedia creative competition at category "games"

This is a very early version of the game, many things will be improved in the future or reworked if necessary.
